1325940.name: CAMEO: CCTV Detective - Original Video Game Soundtrack
1325940.description:
The Original Video Game Soundtrack for the game CAMEO: CCTV Detective.

Experience the mysterious sounds from, and inspired by, the town of ChurchView and the Office of Detective Lopez.

1. The Camera Police
2. Searching for Answers
3. Clues
4. Press Play
5. No Escape
6. The Loop
7. Searching Slowly
8. I'm a Detective
9. Crimson
10. Scanning Quietly
11. Caught on Tape
12. Press Pause
13. Finding Progress
14. Scan the Footage Feat, Reedy
